1660440.name: Way To The Woods
1660440.description:
A Deer and Fawn must embark on a journey through an abandoned world of the unknown to get home.

Gifted a power of light, the Deer and Fawn power through environments seeped in oil.
Clean through the mess left behind and discover new sparks.

-explore a handcraft world
-linear, short game experience
-fawn companion
-grow your light

a third person adventure game by ant tan.
Featuring soundtrack from aivi & surasshu, composers for the show Steven Universe.
1660440.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
